page.title: 16LOCAL NEWS OCTOBER 1985
page.content:
Further local newspaper stories:-
NEW HOMES; A Bedfordshire County Council Report published in October 1985 shows that 26,800 new houses have been built in the county since 1976. 80% were in or around the County's main towns. 68% of the houses were built by private builders, 24% by Local Authorities.
COUNTY SERVICES; Another report released to the press showed that County Council services included:-
Educating 85,000 children
Caring for 1000 old people
Maintaining 2000 km of roads
Lending 6m library books
